SELECT PO.OPINION_SN, PO.OPINION_SJ, PO.OPINION_CN, PO.GOODS_CODE, PO.DELETE_AT, PO.WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(PO.WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITNG_DT, PO.PARENT_OPINION_SN, U.USER_NM, G.GOODS_NM , 0 AS CHILDCNT, 1 AS DEPTH, CPO.OPINION_SN AS C_OPINION_SN, CPO.OPINION_CN AS C_OPINION_CN , CASE WHEN TRUNC(PO.WRITNG_DT) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE-7) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ISNEW , U.EMAIL, PO.CATEGORY FROM ( SELECT OPINION_SN, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT OPINION_SN FROM TB_PURCHS_OPINION WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY OPINION_SN DESC ) A ) B INNER JOIN TB_PURCHS_OPINION PO ON B.OPINION_SN = PO.OPINION_SN INNER JOIN TB_USER U ON PO.WRITNG_ID = U.ESNTL_ID INNER JOIN TB_GOODS G ON PO.GOODS_CODE = G.GOODS_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PURCHS_OPINION CPO ON PO.OPINION_SN = CPO.PARENT_OPINION_SN AND CPO.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #startIdx# AND #endIdx# ORDER BY B.RNUM

SELECT PO.OPINION_SN, PO.OPINION_SJ, PO.OPINION_CN, PO.GOODS_CODE, PO.DELETE_AT, PO.WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(PO.WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITNG_DT, PO.PARENT_OPINION_SN, U.USER_NM, G.GOODS_NM, 0 AS CHILDCNT, 2 AS DEPTH , '' AS C_OPINION_SN, '' AS C_OPINION_CN , CASE WHEN TRUNC(PO.WRITNG_DT) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE-7) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ISNEW , U.EMAIL, PO.CATEGORY FROM TB_PURCHS_OPINION PO INNER JOIN TB_USER U ON PO.WRITNG_ID = U.ESNTL_ID INNER JOIN TB_GOODS G ON PO.GOODS_CODE = G.GOODS_CODE WHERE PO.PARENT_OPINION_SN = #parent_opinion_sn# AND PO.DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY PO.OPINION_SN
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PURCHS_OPINION (OPINION_SN, OPINION_SJ, OPINION_CN, GOODS_CODE, DELETE_AT, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT, PARENT_OPINION_SN, CATEGORY) SELECT NVL(MAX(OPINION_SN), 0) + 1, #opinion_sj#, #opinion_cn:CLOB#, #goods_code#, 'N', #esntl_id#, SYSDATE, #parent_opinion_sn#, #category# FROM TB_PURCHS_OPINION
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_PURCHS_OPINION SET OPINION_SJ = #opinion_sj#, OPINION_CN = #opinion_cn:CLOB#, UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE, CATEGORY = #category# WHERE OPINION_SN = #opinion_sn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT PO.OPINION_SN, PO.OPINION_SJ, PO.OPINION_CN, PO.GOODS_CODE, PO.DELETE_AT, PO.WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(PO.WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITNG_DT, PO.PARENT_OPINION_SN, U.USER_NM, '' AS GOODS_NM , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_PURCHS_OPINION WHERE PARENT_OPINION_SN = PO.OPINION_SN AND DELETE_AT = 'N') AS CHILDCNT, 1 AS DEPTH , '' AS C_OPINION_SN, '' AS C_OPINION_CN , CASE WHEN TRUNC(PO.WRITNG_DT) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE-7) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ISNEW , U.EMAIL, PO.CATEGORY FROM TB_PURCHS_OPINION PO INNER JOIN TB_USER U ON PO.WRITNG_ID = U.ESNTL_ID WHERE OPINION_SN = #opinion_sn#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_PURCHS_OPINION SET DELETE_AT = #delete_at#, UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE OPINION_SN = #opinion_sn#
